definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field></block><block type="render_event_starter" x="68" y="145"><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:CopperMoped</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_model_changer_new"><field name="model">MODELNAME</field><field name="last_line">//</field><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">YOUR_MOD_ID:textures/entities/YOUR_TEXTURE_NAME.png</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block><block type="world_entity_inrange_foreach" x="160" y="385"><value name="_placeholder"><block deletable="false" movable="false" type="entity_iterator"/></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="range"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value><statement name="foreach"><block type="entity_open_gui"><field name="guiname">MopedGUI</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="entity_close_gui"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></next></block></statement></block></xml>
